snippet.title: Shuffle Tactics - Demo Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Shuffle Tactics is a roguelite deckbuilding tactical RPG. Strategize to survive tough battles, pick the right cards to create powerful synergies and bond with your sidekicks to get an edge in battle! Every run is different, who knows what you will encounter on your quest to become Asteria's ruler...

The demo is releasing in June 2023 and the final game in Q2 2024.

✨ Wishlist now on Steam ✨ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2186580/Shuffle_Tactics/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=pre_demo&utm_content=demo_teaser
